screens.headline: Sell near-term monthly. Keep long-term protection.
screens.text: Double diagonals can generate rolling monthly income while your long options protect for months.

screens.headline: Double Diagonal = Two calendars (put side + call side)
screens.text: Sell 30-day options and buy 90-day options at the same strikes on both put and call sides. Shorts decay fast; longs decay slowly; repeat monthly rolls to collect credit.

screens.headline: Renting month-to-month with a long lease
screens.text: Own the long lease (far-dated options). Rent out the property monthly (near-dated options). Each month you collect rent again while still owning the long protection.

reveal_sections.label: Repeat rolls
reveal_sections.content: Collect multiple rents against the same asset

cards.definition: Replace expiring near-term shorts with new 30-day shorts.
